name: Crazy Road Rage
description:
Crazy Road Rage has never been so much fun!

Something must have really annoyed you. Drive your car across the city and along the coast and hit as many of the 'Flump' Citizens as you can. Smash oncoming traffic out of your way. Collect coins to spend on the Prize-o-Matic machine to win new cars and spare fuel cans.

How far can you drive and how many Flumps can you hit?
